pages.title: Bees that produce Combs
pages.text: Most bees produce combs. These combs can then be processed with a $(l:blocks/centrifuge)centrifuge$() to obtain resources such as diamonds, redstone, iron and much more. Not every comb has a 100% chance to produce the resource when consuming it. Additionally honey and wax are produced as well. To view the exact chances and the item output for each comb you can $(l)Right Click$() the combs in JEI
